sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_sub_man.SubscriptionGroupService</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>SubscriptionGroupService</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SubscriptionGroupService = Class.create();
SubscriptionGroupService.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    addGroupsToSubscription: function() {

        var subscriptionSysId = this.getParameter('subscriptionSysId');
        var groupIds = this.getParameter('groupIds').split(',');

        var gr = new GlideRecordSecure('group_has_subscription');
        for (let i = 0; i < groupIds.length; i++) {
            {
                gr.initialize();
                gr.group = groupIds[i];
                gr.subscription = subscriptionSysId;
                gr.insert();
            }

        }
    },
    type: 'SubscriptionGroupService'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-03-22 22:33:11</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>781528bc437d21101f6d73e60db8f23d</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>42</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SubscriptionGroupService</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Subscription Management v2" source="sn_sub_man">86d7bb63ff021110468365d7d3b8fe41</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Subscription Management v2">86d7bb63ff021110468365d7d3b8fe41</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_781528bc437d21101f6d73e60db8f23d</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-04-18 18:11:24</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
